title: WATER and Other Stories
description: A short story about a homeless man (contemporary fiction). ANGEL’S A companion short story to the novel “The Thorn”, book one of “The Chronicles of Gan” (speculative fiction). Based on the account found in the Gospel of John, chapter 5, verses 1-16, and the painting by Carl Bloch, “Healing at the Pool of Bethesda” (historical fiction).
author: Daron D. Fraley
